words.definition: A paid position of regular employment.
words.arabic_definition: مهنة يحصل فيها الشخص على أجر منتظم.

example.en: She has a new job at the bank.

words.definition: A business organization that sells goods or services.
words.arabic_definition: منظمة تجارية تبيع السلع أو الخدمات.

example.en: I work for a software company.

words.definition: A person in charge of a worker or organization.
words.arabic_definition: الشخص المسؤول عن العامل أو المؤسسة.

example.en: I had lunch with my colleagues.

words.definition: The money paid to an employee for work done.
A planned gathering of people for discussion.
words.arabic_definition: تجمع مخطط له لمجموعة من الأشخاص للمناقشة.

example.en: We have a meeting at 10 a.m.

words.definition: A place where people work at desks.
words.arabic_definition: مكان يعمل فيه الناس على مكاتب.

example.en: My office is on the third floor.

words.definition: A move to a higher position at work.
words.arabic_definition: الانتقال إلى منصب أعلى في العمل.

example.en: He got a promotion last month.

words.definition: A person who works for a company or another person.
words.arabic_definition: شخص يعمل في شركة أو لدى شخص آخر.

words.definition: A formal meeting to discuss a job opportunity.

example.en: She has a job interview tomorrow.
